titleStmt.title: Moriz Benedikt
born Kwassitz, Moravia, May 27, 1849; died Vienna, March 18, 1920

publicationStmt.publisher: Schenker Documents Online in association with the Centre for Computing in the Humanities

sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Subeditor (1872-80), then associate editor (1880-1908), finally editor-in-chief (1908-20) of Vienna's leading liberal newspaper, the Neue Freie Presse . He was a powerful and influential figure in Austrian politics and society.

Benedikt was involved, if only peripherally, in Schenker's abortive attempt in 1912 to create an Organization for Creative and Performing Artists. No correspondence between the two men is known to exist.
